page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE-The Simpsons
page.content: My family consists of my parents and myself,we live in a 3 bedroomed bungalow and mostly we use the lounge. The house has gas central heating with radiators in every room and it costs about Â£350 a year to run.Electricity plays an important part in our lives, the electrical things in the kitchen are a fridge, cooker, toaster, kettle, washing machine, spin dryer and radio. We also have clockradios, a hairdryer, a hoover, iron, a trainset and 2 televisions. Sometimes we go out for a meal or drink. We have a car and hardly use public transport. Our hobbies are swimming and cycling. My dad spends like this, 40% of his pay on household bills, 40% on food and 20% on car, holidays, pleasure and savings. We have an average sized garden, lawned at the front and a vegetable patch at the side.
